name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of robust experience in software engineering, specializing in **backend development** within the **FinTech** sector. Proficient in **API design**, **microservices**, and **database management**, ensuring optimal performance and scalability of applications. Demonstrated ability to implement **cloud services** such as AWS and Azure to enhance infrastructure and application deployment.

Adept at delivering high-performance applications through collaboration and strong communication skills. Skilled in languages including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and frameworks like **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Extensive experience in payment processing systems and integration with compliance standards like PCI DSS. Passionate about leveraging technology to optimize performance and streamline backend processes.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed robust backend solutions for the **FinTech** industry, ensuring seamless **payment processing** and adherence to industry standards.
• Engineered microservices architectures utilizing **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for scalable application deployment and maintenance.
• Designed RESTful APIs integrating with **cloud services** like **AWS Lambda** and **Azure Functions** for efficient data processing and retrieval.
• Managed databases including **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB** to optimize data storage and retrieval processes, enhancing overall performance.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure effective communication and integration of services, driving successful project outcomes.
• Implemented performance optimization strategies to improve application response times by **30%**, enhancing user experience in **FinTech** applications.
• Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines leveraging **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI**, streamlining the software engineering process.
• Conducted regular code reviews, promoting best practices and fostering a culture of continuous improvement and collaboration within the team.
• Achieved a **99.9%** uptime for services through proactive monitoring and deployment strategies, ensuring reliability and customer satisfaction.
• Spearheaded the transition to microservices, resulting in a **40%** reduction in deployment times and increased system agility.
• Partnered with various teams to refine API design, focusing on scalability and security in backend development, thus improving integration efforts.
• Defined and executed testing strategies using **Postman** and other testing frameworks, ensuring high-quality deliverables with minimal bugs.

• Utilized **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django) for backend development, modernizing core financial platforms with microservices architecture, resulting in a **30%** improvement in scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
• Engaged in **FinTech** innovations by driving the development of interactive front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, employing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to deliver sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
• Implemented real-time analytics dashboards utilizing **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, delivering crucial insights into transactions and anomalies with an operational efficiency increase of **25%**.
• Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to ensure effective asynchronous communication for critical workflows such as payments with a processing speed of **0.5 seconds**.
• Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, facilitating both batch and real-time processing with over **100 TB** of data handled monthly.
• Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection employing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling a **40%** increase in proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns.
• Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, thereby enhancing overall service response time by **20%**.

• Developed robust **backend development** solutions for a global e-commerce platform using **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **Node.js** (NestJS, Express), ensuring high availability and scalability for critical modules like checkout and order fulfillment.
• Designed and implemented secure **payment processing** workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring compliance with PCI standards and enhancing transaction security.
• Managed distributed data storage with **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis**, achieving performance optimization for over **1M** daily active users through efficient data access and caching strategies.
• Collaborated cross-functionally to ensure seamless **API design** and integration, enhancing communication and cooperation across teams for a more streamlined development process.
• Engineered real-time features leveraging **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture with **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** for immediate order updates and dynamic inventory tracking, positively impacting user engagement metrics by over **25%**.
• Implemented and maintained microservices architecture, allowing for independent deployment and scaling of various platform services, which improved deployment speed by **30%**.
• Applied advanced data management techniques with **Cassandra** to handle high-volume transactions and ensure **99.9%** data availability, contributing to overall platform robustness.
• Enhanced collaboration through regular communication mechanisms to align backend development efforts with overall business objectives and ensure timely project deliveries.
• Spearheaded performance optimization initiatives, utilizing **Redis** caching for product metadata, improving page load times by **50%** and enhancing user experience.
• Integrated cloud services to optimize infrastructure, ensuring scalability and reliability for both backend and frontend applications, adaptable to traffic spikes of up to **3X**.
